post.summary:
CreatePeriodicVestingAccount defines a method that enables creating a
periodic vesting account.

parameters.description:
MsgCreateVestingAccount defines a message that enables creating a vesting
account.
parameters.name: body

post.summary:
CreatePermanentLockedAccount defines a method that enables creating a permanent
locked account.

parameters.description:
MsgCreatePermanentLockedAccount defines a message that enables creating a permanent
locked account.
parameters.name: body

post.summary:
CreateVestingAccount defines a method that enables creating a vesting
account.

parameters.description:
MsgCreateVestingAccount defines a message that enables creating a vesting
account.
parameters.name: body

post.summary:
UpdateParams defines a (governance) operation for updating the module
parameters. The authority defaults to the x/gov module account.

parameters.description: MsgUpdateParams is the Msg/UpdateParams request type.
parameters.name: body

cosmos.base.v1beta1.Coin.description:
Coin defines a token with a denomination and an amount.

NOTE: The amount field is an Int which implements the custom method
signatures required by gogoproto.

cosmos.vesting.v1beta1.MsgCreatePeriodic.description:
MsgCreateVestingAccount defines a message that enables creating a vesting
account.

start_time.description: start of vesting as unix time (in seconds).

cosmos.vesting.v1beta1.MsgCreatePeriodic.description:
MsgCreateVestingAccountResponse defines the Msg/CreatePeriodicVestingAccount
response type.

cosmos.vesting.v1beta1.MsgCreatePermanen.description:
MsgCreatePermanentLockedAccount defines a message that enables creating a permanent
locked account.
MsgCreatePermanentLockedAccountResponse defines the Msg/CreatePermanentLockedAccount response type.

cosmos.vesting.v1beta1.MsgCreateVestingA.description:
MsgCreateVestingAccount defines a message that enables creating a vesting
account.

end_time.description: end of vesting as unix time (in seconds).

cosmos.vesting.v1beta1.MsgCreateVestingA.description: MsgCreateVestingAccountResponse defines the Msg/CreateVestingAccount response type.

cosmos.vesting.v1beta1.Period.description: Period defines a length of time and amount of coins that will vest.

oxtrchain.oxtrchain.v1.MsgUpdateParams.description: MsgUpdateParams is the Msg/UpdateParams request type.

authority.description: authority is the address that controls the module (defaults to x/gov unless overwritten).

params.description:
params defines the module parameters to update.

NOTE: All parameters must be supplied.

oxtrchain.oxtrchain.v1.MsgUpdateParamsRe.description:
MsgUpdateParamsResponse defines the response structure for executing a
MsgUpdateParams message.

oxtrchain.oxtrchain.v1.Params.description: Params defines the parameters for the module.
